summary.label: Professional Summary
summary.text: Full-Stack Developer with over 25 years of experience, specializing in scalable and robust backend and frontend solutions. Experienced with technologies like React, Next.js, Node.js, FastAPI, AWS, Docker, CI/CD, and DevOps. Additionally, I am adaptable, focused on automation, code quality, and delivering efficient solutions. Eager to bring my extensive experience to the next challenge and help drive innovation and success in the next team I join.

items.title: Founder and Lead Developer
responsibilities: Made all the code for NFe na Rede, a web application for invoice management, processing over 1 million invoices.
Reduced invoice authorization time from 1 minute to 5 seconds by automating manual processes, optimizing the website architecture and streamlining the workflow from 10 steps to 1 step.
Managed both frontend and backend programming in an event-driven architecture, enhancing the user experience.
Leveraged my analytical skills to continuously improve operational efficiency by integrating JavaScript frameworks and optimizing PHP usage in a serverless environment as the core invoicing platform.
Increased user satisfaction by 87% through optimizing the frontend experience, enhancing website performance.

items.title: Tech Manager
responsibilities: Led the project management of internal system remodeling, transforming multiple systems into a unified platform, ensuring full integration across departments.
Collaborated with the product team to ensure website architecture was optimized for frontend design and backend functionality.
Supervised the completion of API design and development to ensure seamless integration and improved responsiveness.
Improved system efficiency by 30% after platform unification, resulting in faster internal processes.
Drove enhancements in web application performance while overseeing organizational changes to boost team productivity.

items.title: Backend Team Lead
responsibilities: Led a team of backend developers, coordinating tasks and timelines to ensure the timely delivery of web applications and APIs.
Played a key role in developing APIs and managing complex integrations between the internal systems and external services.
Participated in the recruitment process, including interviewing and onboarding new developers, improving team cohesion and performance.
Used effective communication skills to align technical objectives with business goals.

items.title: Backend Developer
responsibilities: Developed and maintained system routines for marketplace flows, enhancing the backend programming performance using Python and Node.js.
Created a CI/CD pipeline, automating the deployment process and increasing security and stability.
Applied troubleshooting capabilities to optimize database operations and streamline backend performance for improved user experience.

items.title: CTO
responsibilities: Directed the infrastructure transition to AWS, including developing an internal system for EC2 management and enhancing web architecture.
Led backend programming efforts using PHP to integrate new features with external technologies, enhancing system scalability and security.
Designed and developed the frontend in Angular, delivering a better user experience across different devices.
Enhanced operational efficiency, enabling the company to scale operations by 200% and meet the growing demand with reduced costs.
Ensured smooth migrations and integrations by focusing on precision and systematic problem solving skills.

items.title: CEO
responsibilities: Founded App Jolie after a successful Startup Weekend pitch, placing 3rd and securing initial investment for development of a beauty platform.
Led all aspects of the startup, from market research and strategic planning to project management and web architecture.
Adapted quickly to industry demands, gaining valuable insights and developing a comprehensive understanding of the market while expanding my organizational and communication skills.

items.degree: Bachelor of Information Systems (Strategic Planning emphasis)
items.note: Developed essential strategic planning skills that have been pivotal in my professional journey, complementing my technical expertise.
Enhanced my understanding of physics and electricity, sharpening my math skills, which complemented my work in software development.
